summary: A cool stand-alone ninja armor! Male and female support.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/7649-1-1333501310.jpg[/img]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IT\'S FINALLY HERE!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The long awaited Beta4 update is live! There is now an unenchanted version of the armor know as the \"Mundane Ninja Armor\"! You can upgrade you ninja armor at a workbench for an increase in armor and value! The boots have been redone with a much less flashy underside! Plus, the Ninja Project is now available to all races and both genders. Just head over to the files section to grab the Beta4 update!

I hope you enjoy it, and as always, thank you for your support and suggestions that made this mod and update possible! :)



Some of the users of The Ninja Project have this to say:
[quote]best ninja armor... - africankungfu[/quote]
[quote]Looks very ninja indeed... - l0latu[/quote]
[quote]Love this! Endorsed! - BosmerSpock[/quote]

DESCRIPTION-
This mod will add a cool stand-alone ninja armor! This mod has MALE AND FEMALE support. Enjoy!

UPDATES-
-Beta 3 (April 15, 2012) - Added female support, crafting, and improved belt and gloves
-Beta 2 (March 7, 2012) - Added kimono, chainmail, covered neck, and stand-alone armor 

HOW TO GET IT-
You must craft the armor at a forge in order to get it. The armor requires very basic materials (this may be changed later for balancing) and is found under the leather section. 

BUGS-
There are some clipping issues, such as between armor pieces and with certain races trying to wear the mask. These races include: orcs, high elves, and wood elves.

I do realize that there are some bugs at the moment, but I will work to fix them. If anyone has any ideas on ways to fix any of these bugs, please put them in the comments. Thank you.

RECOMMENDED MODS-
The below mods will help increase your ninja experience!

-Dragon Ninjatos by AlexScorpion http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2480

-1HD Weapons on Back TS Edition by TS http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6276

CREDITS-
Infernozard7 - me, made the mod
Sundracon - supplied the mask from the Sundracons Mask of Maru mod
Bethesda - made Skyrim and the Creation Kit
author: Infernozard7
